scripts.build: npm run build_lib & npm run build_app & npm run build_less
scripts.build_min: NODE_ENV=production uglifyjs public/js/lib.js -o public/js/lib.js && uglifyjs public/js/app.js -o public/js/app.js
scripts.build_lib: NODE_ENV=production browserify -r cerebellum -r q -r react -r moment -r react-bootstrap -r lodash -u jquery -u underscore -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/lib.js
scripts.build_app: NODE_ENV=production browserify -x cerebellum -x q -x react -x moment -x react-bootstrap -x lodash client.coffee -t coffee-reactify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/app.js
scripts.watch_lib: watchify -r cerebellum -r q -r react -r moment -r react-bootstrap -r lodash -u jquery -u underscore -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/lib.js -v
scripts.watch_app: watchify -x cerebellum -x q -x react -x moment -x react-bootstrap -x lodash client.coffee -d -t coffee-reactify --extension='.coffee' -o public/js/app.js -v
scripts.watch_code: npm run watch_app & npm run watch_lib
scripts.watch: npm run watch_app & npm run watch_lib & npm run watch_less
scripts.postinstall: npm run build_lib && npm run build_app && npm run build_min
